ivory.smrf.model.score
Class DirichletScoringFunction

java.lang.Object
  ivory.smrf.model.score.ScoringFunction
      ivory.smrf.model.score.DirichletScoringFunction
Direct Known Subclasses:
CascadeDirichletScoringFunction
public class DirichletScoringFunction
extends ScoringFunction

Computes score based on language modeling using Dirichlet smoothing.

Author:
Don Metzler
